enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve operations related to margin accounts and require similar parameter checks.
Both methods require similar parameters like 'email', 'asset', and 'amount', which can be reused for setting up test cases.
The 'marginAccount' method returns detailed information about the margin account, which can be used to verify the state of the margin account after a transfer.
The 'futuresAccount' method returns detailed information about the futures account, which can be used to verify the state of the account after a transfer, similar to how 'marginAccount' can be used.
